Invoked for batch operations involving multiple document creations or updates.

import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

```mdx-code-block
<Tabs groupId="hooks">
<TabItem value="Rust">
```

```rust
#[on_set_many_docs]
async fn on_set_many_docs(context: OnSetManyDocsContext) -> Result<(), String> {
    // Custom logic for handling multiple document creations or updates
    Ok(())
}
```

Similarly to [on_set_doc](#on_set_doc), the hook can scope the events to a particular list of collections or be left empty if it should never fire.

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="TypeScript">
```

```typescript
export const onSetManyDocs = defineHook<OnSetManyDocs>({
  collections: [],
  run: async (context) => {
    // Custom logic for handling multiple document creations or updates
  }
});
```

Similarly to [on_set_doc](#on_set_doc), the hook must scope the events to a particular list of collections. If the array is left empty, the hook will never be called.

```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```
